EmailTemplate.subject: Deploy an omni-channel approach to customer support

${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Engage Customers Over Multiple Channels Omni-channel care improves customer experience Today’s digital consumers can seek support via self-service, interactive live response, social media and more. To address this diversity of options, omni-channel solutions provide a flexible, seamless and consistent customer experience across all channels.
Through recent developments in continously improving customer experience, operators can realize the benefits of omni-channel. Read the Solving the Customer Care Paradox: How To Increase Customer Satisfaction While Dramatically Lowering Support Cost white paper or register for the 30-minute Tear Down Siloes and Build Up Loyalty: The Power of Omni-Channel webinar to learn how these technology advances can result in:
- Faster Problem Resolution - Lower Costs - Reduced Customer Turnover Connect with us © 2017 Nokia.
